name: Cubic Color
description:
Cubic Color
Cubic Color is a game to test and improve your reaction time.

Random colored cubes keep coming from the bottom and you must match the color to destroy then and score before you're dragged out of the screen. It has an addictive and relaxing gameplay.

How to play:
Left click or A,D or Arrow to move the player Cube.
Match cube of the same color to clear lines. How far can you go?

FEATURES :
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect time killer.

*Ideal for playing one handed. Mouse or simple keys controls.

*Steam Leaderboard

*Steam Achievements
